=== Testing FSCALE ===

Test 1: Basic case: 1.0 * 2^1
Base: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Exponent: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 2.00000000000000000000 (0x40008000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 2: Integer scaling: 2.0 * 2^3
Base: 2.00000000000000000000 (0x40008000000000000000)
Exponent: 3.00000000000000000000 (0x4000c000000000000000)
Result: 16.00000000000000000000 (0x40038000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 3: Negative exponent: 1.5 * 2^-1
Base: 1.50000000000000000000 (0x3fffc000000000000000)
Exponent: -1.00000000000000000000 (0xbfff8000000000000000)
Result: 0.75000000000000000000 (0x3ffec000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 4: Zero base: 0.0 * 2^10
Base: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Exponent: 10.00000000000000000000 (0x4002a000000000000000)
Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 5: Zero exponent: 1.0 * 2^0
Base: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Exponent: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x00000000000000000000)
Result: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0000
Tag Word:     0x0000
Top: 0
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 6: Infinity base
Base: inf (0x7fff8000000000000000)

Result: inf (0x7fff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0500
Tag Word:     0x0500
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 1, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 7: Infinity exponent

Tag Word:     0x0500

C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 1, C3: 0
Exceptions:

Tag Word:     0x0500
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 1, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 9: Negative infinity exponent

Exceptions:

Test 12: Max double scaling
Base: .00000000000000000000 (0x43fefffffffffffff800)

Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0100
Tag Word:     0x0100
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 13: Min double scaling
Base: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x3c018000000000000000)

Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x3c008000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0100
Tag Word:     0x0100
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 14: Large positive exponent
Base: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Exponent: 1024.00000000000000000000 (0x40098000000000000000)

Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0100
Tag Word:     0x0100
Top: 0
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 

Test 15: Large negative exponent

Result: 0.00000000000000000000 (0x3bff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x0100
Tag Word:     0x0100

C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
